name: BuildingWorlds_Midterm_demo1
description:
The effects is a combination of mouse clicking and key pressing.

Once you left click the mouse, the colors of generating particles will change randomly

Press "G" add green; Press "Y" add yellow;

Press "M" add magenta; Press "B" add blue;

Press "P" add purple;

The colors of three pumpkins will change based on the key pressing

Then,

Use arrow keys to rotate the ground plane and view. And bounce the ball.

Press "R" , reset the camera;
